description: No Middle Eastern meze table is complete without a bowl of this creamy dip
keywords: Baba ganoush,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Sauce & condiment
name: Creamy Baba Ganoush Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs tahini, plus more to taste
2 tbs fresh lemon juice, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 220°C. Lightly oil a baking sheet. Make a deep lengthwise incision, without cutting through the skin, down the center of the cut side of each eggplant half. Place on the baking sheet, skin side up. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the flesh is thoroughly softened and collapsing.
Transfer the eggplant halves to a colander on a plate. Let stand for 15 minutes, or until they are cool enough to handle.

Scoop the eggplant flesh into a food processor. Add the tahini and lemon juice with the olive oil, yoghurt, and garlic, and process until smooth. Taste and adjust the tahini and lemon juice as needed, then season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with cilantro, and serve.
